title: Apple reportedly readies iOS 26.4 with smarter Siri and Intelligence tools: What to expect

title: Apple iPhone 18 Pro leak hints at big gains in night photography: What to expect
snippet: Apple is reportedly testing major camera upgrades for future iPhones, including a variable aperture main sensor and a brighter telephoto lens. The changes could improve low light shots, depth control and zoom performance on upcoming Pro models, delivering more flexible and professional photography.

title: OpenAI reportedly planning AI earbuds ahead of more advanced device
